thread.title: List of Things Progressives Should Do Before Primarying Joe Manchin
thread.title_full: List of Things Progressives Should Do Before Primarying Joe Manchin

author: Anthony Bejarano
title: List of Things Progressives Should Do Before Primarying Joe Manchin
text: Blocked Unblock Follow Following Liberal politico. Film buff faker. Thinks too much for own good. Vice-Chair, Graham County Dems. Former @AZDemParty Field Organizer. Knowledge Bowl Supreme. 13 mins ago List of Things Progressives Should Do Before Primarying Joe Manchin After Joe Manchin voted to confirm Jeff Sessions as Attorney General, I heard that there were some calls from people on the left to primary him. Now, I wouldnâ€™t do that . But I cannot 100% control the actions of everyone else. So, instead, I offer a list of things I think fellow progressives should consider dedicating time, money, and energy towards before trying to knock out Manchin: Beat Dean Heller ( Nevada ) Find out about the other four Democratic senators in Romney-Trump states , defend some of them Defend the Obama-Trump state Democratic senators: Nelson (Florida), Stabenow (Michigan), Brown (Ohio), Casey (Pennsylvania), and Baldwin (Wisconsin) Beat Jeff Flake (Arizona), a Republican senator in a Romney state that Trump won with less than 50%
